ygData.subject: Re: Useful spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... For me as a human spellcaster, Halo of Light was worth it for the additional light it casts, and has a +4 AC bonus. (I also got cancel magic but I would
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:21 PM 6/1/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>
>
>Has anyone found any lvl 12 spells (except bind and shock of lightning) that
>are really worth the cost?

For me as a human spellcaster, Halo of Light was worth it for the
additional light it casts, and has a +4 AC bonus. (I also got cancel magic
but I would pass on that unless Verant actually makes it useful). I can't
wait until level 16 when I can get Heat Vision. I will then actually be
able to see where I'm going all the time instead of half the time.

Greg (Kronan)
